select suser.user_id as userId, suser.account as account, suser.nick_name as nickName, suser.real_name as realName, suser.avatar as avatar, suser.birthday as birthday, suser.sex as sex, suser.email as email, suser.phone as phone, suser.tel as tel, suser.status_flag as statusFlag, suorg.org_id as orgId, suorg.position_id as positionId, hpos.position_name as positionName, hrorg.org_name as orgName from sys_user suser left join sys_user_org suorg on suser.user_id = suorg.user_id left join hr_position hpos on suorg.position_id = hpos.position_id left join hr_organization hrorg on suorg.org_id = hrorg.org_id
and suser.real_name like concat('%',#{sysUserRequest.realName},'%')
and suser.account like concat('%',#{sysUserRequest.account},'%')
and suser.status_flag like concat('%',#{sysUserRequest.statusFlag},'%')
and suorg.org_id in (select org_id from hr_organization where org_pids like CONCAT('%$[',#{sysUserRequest.orgId},'$]%') escape '$' or org_id=#{sysUserRequest.orgId} )
and suorg.org_id in
#{item}

#{item}

select suser.user_id as userId, suser.account as account, suser.nick_name as nickName, suser.real_name as realName, suser.avatar as avatar, suser.birthday as birthday, suser.sex as sex, suser.email as email, suser.phone as phone, suser.tel as tel, suser.status_flag as statusFlag, suorg.org_id as orgId, suorg.position_id as positionId, hpos.position_name as positionName, hrorg.org_name as orgName from sys_user suser left join sys_user_org suorg on suser.user_id = suorg.user_id left join hr_position hpos on suorg.position_id = hpos.position_id left join hr_organization hrorg on suorg.org_id = hrorg.org_id
and suser.real_name like '%' || #{sysUserRequest.realName} || '%'
and suser.account like '%' || #{sysUserRequest.account} || '%'
and suser.status_flag like '%' || #{sysUserRequest.statusFlag} || '%'
and suorg.org_id in(select org_id from hr_organization where org_pids like '%' || #{sysUserRequest.orgId} || '%' or org_id = #{sysUserRequest.orgId})
and suser.del_flag = 'N' order by suser.create_time desc
